name: RecipeExplorer
title: Recipe Explorer Webpage
author: Peter HozÃ¡k (Aprillion)
description:
Creates %appdata%/Factorio/script-output/RecipeExplorer/index.html on each game load/save, for exploring recipes (including mods and cost modifiers, current technology research status)... 

Any mods changing icon/order in data-final-fixes.lua should be requested for addition as optional dependencies to this mod (via https://github.com/Aprillion/recipe_explorer/issues).
